alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Carroll; Cheshire; Grafton; Hillsborough; Merrimack; Rockingham; Strafford; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 14 at 3:14PM EST until January 14 at 4:15PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Rockingham County in southern New Hampshire... Western Strafford County in central New Hampshire... Eastern Sullivan County in central New Hampshire... Southern Grafton County in northern New Hampshire... Eastern Cheshire County in southern New Hampshire... Hillsborough County in southern New Hampshire... Belknap County in central New Hampshire... Merrimack County in central New Hampshire... Southern Carroll County in northern New Hampshire... * Until 415 PM EST. * At 313 PM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Holderness to Brookline, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow. Gusty winds leading to blowing snow and visibility rapidly falling to less than one-quarter mile. Wind gusts greater than 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous and life-threatening travel conditions are expected to develop rapidly in the warning area. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 89 between mile markers 0 and 51. Interstate 93 between mile markers 1 and 87. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Nashua, Concord, Derry, Rochester, Laconia, Exeter, Lebanon, Franklin, Jaffrey, Henniker, New London, Plymouth, Salem, Merrimack, Moultonborough, Ossipee, Meredith, Northwood, and Grafton. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...RADAR INDICATED SNOW SQUALL IMPACT...SIGNIFICANT

area.areaDesc: Belknap; Carroll; Cheshire; Grafton; Hillsborough; Merrimack; Rockingham; Strafford; Sullivan
